title: Businesses get practical AI and digital insights from experts at marketing event
description: Business owners were briefed on key marketing topics including the best ways of using artificial intelligence at a Wolverhampton Business Week session.

title: Google to invest $15bn in India, build largest AI hub outside US
description: Google said Tuesday it will invest $15 billion in India over the next five years, as it announced a giant data centre and artificial intelligence base in the country.It is the largest AI hub that...
content:
Google said Tuesday it will invest $15 billion in India over the next five years, as it announced a giant data centre and artificial intelligence base in the country.

title: US senator seeks Commerce Department investigation into Megaspeed
description: U.S. Republican Senator Tom Cotton has asked the Commerce Department to investigate Singapore-based Megaspeed for allegedly diverting Nvidia chips used for artificial intelligence, according to a letter seen by Reuters on Monday.
content: The letter cites an October report in The New York Times that detailed the alleged diversion of Nvidia chips by Megaspeed, a cloud computing company. According to the report, Megaspeed funneled Nvidia chips to Malaysia and Indonesia that appeared to ... [1816 chars]

title: AI has role to play in national-interest projects: proponents
description: A Calgary tech company says artificial intelligence could help cut down on the time, money and manpower needed to shepherd complex nation-building projects from early development through to regulatory hearings.

title: How AI is Shaping Personalized Language Learning Experiences
description: The advent of artificial intelligence (AI) has revolutionized numerous fields, from healthcare to finance. However, one of the most exciting and impactful transformations is occurring in the realm of education, particularly in language learning. AI-driven technologies are now enabling personalized learning experiences, making the mastery of a new language more accessible, efficient, and engaging than […]

title: ASML’s Best Month in Two Decades Puts Earnings in Spotlight
description: ASML Holding NV faces a potentially tricky earnings test, after the stock rallied 45% in little over a month on hopes that the accelerating buildout in artificial intelligence infrastructure will drive chip equipment orders.

title: US biotech Nabla Bio, Japan's Takeda expand AI drug design partnership
description: (Reuters) -U.S. biotech firm Nabla Bio said on Tuesday it has signed a second major research partnership with Japanese drugmaker Takeda Pharmaceutical, deepening their use of artificial intelligence to accelerate drug discovery.

title: Most Investors Say AI Stocks Are in a Bubble, BofA Poll Shows
description: A record share of global fund managers said artificial intelligence stocks are in a bubble following a torrid rally this year, according to a survey by Bank of America Corp.
content:
(Bloomberg) -- A record share of global fund managers said artificial intelligence stocks are in a bubble following a torrid rally this year, according to a survey by Bank of America Corp.
